ModMetaData.name: [KV] Adjustable Trade Ships
ModMetaData.author: Kiame Vivacity
ModMetaData.description:
Set the frequency of trade ships in settings on the fly. Set a global value and a game-specific value.
Translators: XNoNameX - German DrOzon - Spanish 长空X & 姚晗 - Chinese Tkhakiro - Russian isty2e - Korean Jackobe93 - Czech randrade86 - PT-BR
